assessment.question: Which keyword is used to catch exceptions in Python?
What will happen if an exception occurs inside a try block but there is no except block?
options: The program executes the next line

assessment.question: The finally block always executes, __________ of exceptions.
options: only in case of an error

assessment.question: The raise keyword is used to __________ an exception manually.
Every try block must have at least one except block.
